description.en: A gorgeous porcelain chest framed with gold. Contains powerful rewards.
description.ru: Прекрасный фарфоровый сундук обрамленный золотом. Содержит мощную награду.

popupContent.en: Break the Scarlet Quartz on the north cliff in Mondstadt, glide over, and break the ice to reveal the chest. Contains Crimson Agate.
